Lucky Coin

shield (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 157
armor id [armor]: 67 (Lucky Coin)
protection, shield [protshield]: 19
parry [parry]: 4
(lucky [luck])

Requires 10S to forge (S2)

A buckler of polished silver, it has inscribed on its surface the face of an unknown statesman grinning at some private joke. The figure on the surface of the shield is reputedly the lover of Lady Luck and his face makes the bearer pleasant in the eyes of the Lady.
